mapper.select: SELECT B.MSG_GRP_CD AS msgGrpCd, B.MSG_CD AS msgCd, B.LANG_CD AS langCd, B.MSG_NM AS msgNm FROM MESSAGES A, MESSAGE_LOCALE B WHERE A.MSG_GRP_CD = B.MSG_GRP_CD AND A.MSG_CD = B.MSG_CD AND B.LANG_CD = #{langCd}
SELECT MSG_PK AS msgPk, MSG_GRP_CD AS msgGrpCd, MSG_CD AS msgCd, MSG_NM AS msgNm FROM MESSAGES WHERE MSG_PK = #{msgPk}
SELECT MSG_PK AS msgPk, MSG_GRP_CD AS msgGrpCd, MSG_CD AS msgCd, MSG_NM AS msgNm FROM MESSAGES WHERE MSG_GRP_CD = #{msgGrpCd} AND MSG_CD = #{msgCd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MESSAGES ( MSG_PK, MSG_GRP_CD, MSG_CD, MSG_NM, REG_DATE, REG_USER_ID ) VALUES ( #{msgPk}, #{msgGrpCd}, #{msgCd}, #{msgNm}, SYSDATE, #{userId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE MESSAGES SET MSG_GRP_CD = #{msgGrpCd}, MSG_CD = #{msgCd}, MSG_NM = #{msgNm}, UPD_DATE = SYSDATE, UPD_USER_ID = #{userId} WHERE MSG_PK = #{msgPk}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MESSAGE_LOCALE ( MSG_LOC_PK, MSG_GRP_CD, MSG_CD, LANG_CD, MSG_NM, REG_DATE, REG_USER_ID ) VALUES ( TO_CHAR(MSG_LOC_PK_SEQ.NEXTVAL,'FM0000000000'), #{msgGrpCd}, #{msgCd}, #{langCd}, #{msgNm}, SYSDATE, #{userId} )
